TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Pierre_Nkurunziza, title = Pierre_Nkurunziza, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pierre_Nkurunziza} }

S.FORM: Pierre Nkurunziza I 1963 a miheca saka 12 folad saka 18 a romi'ad masofoc ci Pierre Nkurunziza, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Burundi anini i ci Pierre Nkurunziza, patirengan a romi'ad i 2005 a miheca saka 4 folad saka 26 a romi'ad.
